concept.title: Sub-Classifications and the Rule Builder - Use Case
concept.shortdesc: You can combine the Classification Rule Builder with sub-classifications to simplify classification management and reduce the number of rules required. You might want to do this if your tracking code consists of codes that you would like to classify separately.

conbody.p: See for conceptual information about sub-classifications.

A classification hierarchy allows you to apply a classification to a classification (called sub-classification). Meaning, you can use the importer like a relational database, with multiple tables. One table maps full tracking codes to keys, and another maps those keys to other tables.
